title: About me
text:
I am a first-year master’s student in the Gong group.
Recently I have been interested in generalized symmetry.
I compose music as a hobby.


Current Affiliation

Gong group
Dept. of Appl. Phys., Faculty of Engineering, The University of Tokyo

Let’s wrap up the year 2023

title: Home
text:
2024/10/16 Research with Ken Mochizuki and Zongping Gong has been uploaded to arXiv: Threefold Way for Typical Entanglement
2024/09/16-9/19 Participated in The Physical Society of Japan 2024 Annual Meating held at Hokkaido university.
2024/08/12-8/16 Participated in Symmetries 2024 held at the university of Oxford.
2024/04/01 Joined Gong group, dept. of appl. phys., graduate school of eng., the Univ. of Tokyo
